entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to periods of light snow this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
